hanzi-su-wiki:
塾

Значения

Частная школа, пансион

Мнемоника

Место 土, где сильно дерут 孰, т.е. учат — частная школа.
purpleculture_pinyin:
shú
private school
частная школа
rtega_mnemonic:
塾塾RSvillage school, private tutourage
  • place where one learns to turn clay 土 into something to be baked in the oven 孰
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 孰 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
私塾 [ sī shú ]: private school (in former times)
村塾 [ cūn shú ]: (old) village school; rural school
蒙塾 [ méng shú ]: primary school
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 孰 [ shú ] who? which? what? which one?
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
heisig_constituent: cram school, receive, tall, top hat, mouth, child, children, round, nine, baseball, drop, soil, dirt, ground
heisig_story: Cram schools are after-hours educational institutions where kids can do concentrated preparing for their coming entrance examinations or drill what they missed during regular class hours. The exception are the tall children who are out on the school grounds practicing sports, and the fat ones who are out there burning off calories. So this character depicts those who do NOT go to the cram schools, rather than those who do.
koohiiStory1: Welcome to our cram school: you will receive a rounded education on our grounds.
koohiiStory2: You can receive a well-rounded education if you study at our cram school says the advertisement. "Just come to our school grounds and check it out yourself!".
jp_example_words: 塾(じゅく): coaching school, lessons
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's a sock circle in the dirt on your way to cram school. Every day after school you walk straight until you get to the sock circle, you run around it, and then head off in any direction. Somehow it always leads to cram school.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the sock circle in the dirt in your mind. Now look up and see cram school through the trees.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The sock circle seems to have a bit of a gravitational pull, so to make sure you get to cram school on time you have to juke (じゅく) around it every day, to make sure you can get past it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Normal kids would probably try to juke cram school, since it's hard and it's more school than they think they need. But you're a good kid who want to cram, so you juke the circle instead.
Ru_Russian: подготовительная школа <small>(отдельное учебное заведение, где школьников готовят к поступлению в старшую школу или институт)</small>
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 孰 (いずれ、ジュク какой, кто). Не путать: 熟 (うれる、ジュク зрелый, спелый).
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 亠 (крышка), 九 (девять), 口 (рот), 土 (земля), 子 (ребёнок)
Ru_trainchinese: shú: (графема) частные уроки; частная школа
Kanshudo_mnemonic: there would be enjoyment (享) all round (丸) the ground (土) at cram school

塾字的基本解释

塾
shú
旧时私人设立的教学的地方：塾师。家塾。私塾。
古代指门内东西两侧的堂屋。

塾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shú］
［《廣韻》殊六切，入屋，禪。］
(1)宫门外两侧房屋，为臣僚等候朝见皇帝之处。
(2)古时门内东西两侧的屋。
(3)旧时私人设立的进行教学的地方。
(4)射垛，箭靶。

塾字的英文翻译

◎ 塾
private school

塾字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第10
【廣韻】殊六切【集韻】【韻會】神六切，?音孰。【說文】門側堂也。【禮·學記】古之敎者，黨有庠，家有塾。【儀禮·冠禮】具饌于西塾。　又【三輔黃圖】未央宮外有塾門。【古今注】塾之爲言熟也。臣朝君，至塾門，更詳熟所應對之事。　又【前漢·食貨志】春將出民里胥，平旦坐于右塾，鄰長坐于左塾。　又疾也。【山海經】首山之隂曰机谷，多?鳥，其狀如梟而三目，食之巳塾。?音地。

塾字的源字形

塾字的起名意思

旧时称私人教学的地点。

Basic explanation of words
private school
shú
The old private teaching place: school teacher. Home school. Private school.
In ancient times, it refers to the halls on the east and west sides of the door.
private school
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shú］
["Guangyun" has six different cuts, enters the house, Zen. ]
(1) The houses on both sides of the palace gate are places where officials wait for the emperor to meet.
(2) The houses on the east and west sides of the door in ancient times.
(3) A place set up privately for teaching in the old days.
(4) Shooting, archery target.

Name meaning
It used to be called a place of private teaching.
形声字。土表意,表示和土木建筑有关;孰(shd )表声,孰是熟的初文,古时东西塾常用于习射或课读,有使人熟通六艺
(礼乐射御书数)之意。本义是古时门内东西两侧的堂屋。引

, 些
塾
プ
楷
一
L上r( ttr .
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение слова «почва» означает, что оно связано с гражданской архитектурой, что (шд) означает звук, который является знакомым ранним текстом. В древние времена восточные и западные школы часто использовались для обучения стрельбе или чтению в классе.
Первоначальное значение - залы на восточной и западной сторонах ворот в древности.
В более широком смысле, это относится к месту, созданному в частном порядке для преподавания в прошлом.
Старое частное место обучения: ~ Учитель | Частный ~.
~ Шицун ~ Дом ~ Частный ~ Городок ~ Школа ~ Праведность ~

Radicals: 享, 丸, 土  (sock, circle, dirt)
Meaning Mnemonic
There's a sock circle in the dirt on your way to cram school. Every day after school you walk straight until you get to the sock circle, you run around it, and then head off in any direction. Somehow it always leads to cram school.
Picture the sock circle in the dirt in your mind. Now look up and see cram school through the trees.
Reading Mnemonic
The sock circle seems to have a bit of a gravitational pull, so to make sure you get to cram school on time you have to juke (じゅく) around it every day, to make sure you can get past it.
Normal kids would probably try to juke cram school, since it's hard and it's more school than they think they need. But you're a good kid who want to cram, so you juke the circle instead.
